## Injector.resolve() method

Resolve a dependency

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolve<T>(target: Constructor<T> | InjectToken<T>, optional?: boolean): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | <code>Constructor&lt;T&gt; &#124; InjectToken&lt;T&gt;</code> | The class or [InjectToken](./injector.injecttoken.md) to resolve |
|  optional | <code>boolean</code> | Should the dependency be optional. If <code>true</code> the injector will not throw an error if it cannot resolve the dependency and returns <code>undefined</code>. If <code>false</code> the injector will throw an error if the dependency cannot be resolved. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T | undefined`
